job_title: Senior Consultant / Manager, Human Capital – HR Cloud - Geneva
job_description: Job DescriptionHuman Capital Consulting at Deloitte is the largest Human Capital practice in Switzerland and is widely recognized by our clients for our ability to walk in their shoes as a true partner, bring leading insights and expertise as well as consistently deliver high-quality work.How you can make an impact: As a HR Cloud Senior Consultant / Manager, your focus will be on advising and implementing cloud technology solutions for diverse clients and projects.  Help our clients with transforming their HR function by means of digitalizing their HR environment, using cloud technologies such as Workday, SAP SuccessFactors, Oracle or ServiceNow HR to realize this change. These technologies are the future of HR and can improve both the experience of the employee, as well as HR efficiency for the employer. Help organizations to realize that future!  You contribute by applying expert knowledge and experience on a cloud solution, and by executing deliverables independently and with quality.  At Deloitte, we work with our clients, therefore you will spend most of your time with a multidisciplinary Deloitte team at the client and will be an essential first point of contact. In this role you will: Align HR functional and / or HR technological drivers with business drivers to tailor an action plan through proven methodologies and ways which can best solve client challenges  Guide the final deliverables of the go-Live  Perform quality assurance and give advice about HR IT strategies and roadmaps, their design, and to create and improve these strategies In addition, you will: Work with Swiss and international clients in all stages of the pursuit transformation lifecycle  Contribute to business development of clients and accounts, in Switzerland and specifically in the Romandie area  Get the opportunity to specialise and obtain certifications in the leading tools on the HR technology market  Be part of a highly motivated, multicultural team, where you can expect new challenges every day that will allow you to grow professionally and personally! Who we are looking for: You have the courage to try out new things and to keep learning, even if there are setbacks  along the way. For this role you also have:  An excellent command of written and spoken English and French (mandatory). German is a plus.  Flexibility to travel within Switzerland  Experience in shaping digital HR strategy and with HR cloud technologies implementation (Workday, SAP SuccessFactors or ServiceNow HRSD)  A certification in one or more of the HR cloud technologies (Workday, SAP SuccessFactors or ServiceNow HRSD)  A relevant university degree (HR, Business, or IT) with excellent academic results  Relevant working experience in HR cloud or HR processes, preferably for a consultancy firm  A feel for cultural diversity and organizational structures  The ability to work in international teams  Previous experience in managing multiple priorities and delivering quality commitments on time  Strong analytical skills, combined with excellent social and communication skills  An excellent relationship builder with clients and fellow consultants, with great interpersonal skills and the ability to build and sustain long-term relationships  An independent worker, taking initiative and happy taking on responsibility Important questions you should ask yourself before applying: Do you feel engaged and want to work with business leaders, and alongside some of the most creative thinkers in the industry?  Do you want to learn how to develop and deliver innovative core technologies solutions, which transforms the digital enterprise?  Do you want to work together to simplify complex processes and creating tangible value for our clients? If you can demonstrate that you meet the criteria above and you are able to respond to questions with a YES , please submit a complete application, including CV, cover letter, references, and degree certificates, using our online career portal http://www.deloitte.com/careersAt Deloitte, we will give you the chance to build your individual career, with a global network, supportive team, a diverse culture, and cutting-edge technologies. Our Human Capital team is looking for your voice and perspective to help us to create “Moments That Matter” for Deloitte and our clients. Join our team and become the best version of yourself, helping the team to get even better!What is the Human Capital team offering to the client:Our Human Capital team helps organizations manage and sustain their performance through their most important asset: their people. Leveraging research, analytics, and industry insights, we support clients to design and execute critical programs from business-driven HR to innovative talent, leadership, organizational and change programs in business transformations.Careers at Deloitte. Your unique expertise, background and perspective helps us find new ways into the most complex challenges so we can brighten the futures of those our work affects. At Deloitte, you can build a career that inspires and energises you. At Deloitte, you can choose your impact.In Switzerland, we provide industry-specific services in the areas of Audit & Assurance, Consulting, Financial Advisory, Risk Advisory and Tax & Legal.
